name: Stone Spirit Guardian #75
description: A guardian spirit with a body resembling stone, covered in intricate glowing vines and leaves. Their expression is calm and serene, with glowing blue eyes that reflect a deep connection with nature. The detailed cracks in their stone-like skin and the luminous energy flowing through their form convey a sense of ancient wisdom and power.

attributes.value: Braided, stone-like texture with glowing accents
Natural energy flow with moss and vines
Mystical forest with soft, glowing lights
Subtle glowing energy lines within stone skin
Ancient, lush forest with ambient light
